title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Tina Ramirez | 9/17/21
description:
Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss the influx of Haitian immigrants at the Texas border. Glenn's anger boils over when discussing the many examples of our government not caring about people. Virginia congressional candidate Tina Ramirez joins to discuss woman’s rights in Afghanistan, Nancy Pelosi, and religious freedom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
